summary: Non lore-friendly tattoo pack containing 47 overlays for RaceMenu
descriptionHtml:
Contains a total of 47 overlays for RaceMenu including hands and feet.

[b]Compatibility:[/b]
All overlays were designed to be used for UNP bodies and should be compatible with all UNP body types including SevenBase which were used in the screenshots. Overlays will work with other body types, however you may experience incorrect scaling, perspective, and have issues with areas near seam lines.

[b]Troubleshooting:[/b]
There's a known issue where RaceMenu overlay sections will be empty. To resolve this try installing Loose Base Scripts available under Optional Files from the RaceMenu (link in Required Mods section) page.

[b]Tools Used:[/b]
[url=http://www.gimp.org]GIMP[/url]
[url=http://code.google.com/p/gimp-dds]GIMP DDS Plugin[/url]

[b]Required Mods:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu by expired6978[/url]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE[/url]

[b]Recommended Mods:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?]ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer[/url]

[b]Manual Install or Uninstall[/b]
Install: Unpack to Skyrim folder.

Uninstall: Remove RutahTattooPack.esp, RutahTattooPack.bsl, RutahTattooPack.bsa from Skyrim data folder

[b]Load Order:[/b]
Place after RaceMenu.esp

[b]Notes:[/b]
All body overlays are 4096x4096 resolution and use BC3/DXT5 compression.

[b]Mods Used in Screenshots:[/b]
Body - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SevenBase[/url]
Body Textures - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Original UNP by Dimonized[/url]
Face - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26113/?]Better Females by Bella No Makeup Version[/url]
Hair - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD - 2k Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and Effects - Interiors[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB[/url]

[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/pinup-poser-s/]Pinup Poser[/url] (External Link)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]FNIS Behavior Files[/url]


[b]Credits:[/b]
[url=http://www.deviantart.com]deviantArt[/url] and respective authors for brushes.
author: Rutah
